info.description:
This is a story about a boy called Gareth who is transformed (with no explination) into various different objects and is used unknowingly by different people

your family
Gareth-16, short brown hair, normal sized,wears designer glasses and enjoys playing football
(sister) Rachel-15, long brown hair in a ponytail, always wear designer sunglasses and pretty clothes, small for someone her age and enjoys doing gymnastics and her favourite colour is pink
(sister)Rebekah- 18, Long straight blond hair, is always on her phone or writing in her diary, she is an average height for her age. She always wears tight fitting clothes and skirts and tights at other times. She can also drive as she has passed her test and has her own car.
(mother) Susan-40, short brown hair,fit, enjoys making herself stand out from the croud in everything she does, from the clothes she wears to the way she acts (she isn't insane)
(father) Richard- 46, has extremely short black hair, doesn't do much excercise and just sits about watching sports on TV.

other characters (which others can make) will be included into the story later but only his family appear here

A few rules
1.No swearing
2.no deaths
3.No one option continues always have two or more options
4.Try to use proper grammar
5.toilet stuff is allowed and gareth can also be transformed into body parts etc
6.There is no set time for the transformations but if he doesn't transform within a year he transforms into something else
7.When gareth is transformed no one remembers him so no characters asking "wheres Gareth" etc
8.James can only become an object of someone he knows, no total strangers however if he is given to someone he knows and given to someone he doesn't thats OK but then when he transforms again it is with someone he knows.
9.If possible don't come up with how he has been transformed early on at least it makes it slightly more akward to for me to write then.(I may allow an explination later on in the story)
10. preferably female users but there's no complaints about the odd male item.
11. If Gareth is in a situation which would destroy him he is transformed to the nearst safe object

P.S if any authors find this to be similar to their work i appologise as it isn't intentional. if it is similar to anything you have done contact me

Other than that go wild and if you have a good idea add it and you might encourage others to continue.

Gps for good additions which will be sent to on site email address
